name: wide-grip-chin-up
title: Wide Grip Chin Up
primer: This variation on the basic chin up is a great exercise for people who rock climb.
steps: Grasp a chin up bar with a slightly wider than shoulder width grip.
Keeping your body straight pull yourself up and to one side of the bar.
Lower your body back down to the starting position.
Raise yourself to the other side of the bar.
tips: Ensure to hang dow completely before alternating to the other side.
